casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kurt Deion FREDERICK 146A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 20, 2018

John Keating Wiles, Attorney at Law, Raleigh.

James Aldean Webster, III, Assistant Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Amanda S. Hitchcock, Assistant Appellate Defender, Kurt Deoin Frederick, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Frederick, Kurt Deion.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 20th of July 2018 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of July 2018."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 22nd day of August 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
